briefTitle: Selective Sentinella Lymph Node Biopsy with Indocyanine Green in Patients with Breast Cancer
officialTitle: INDOCYANINE GREEN for SELECTIVE SENTINELLA AXILLARY LYMPH NODE BIOPSY in PATIENTS with BREAST CANCER
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of Sentinel lymph node detected. Scale of numbers
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients \>18 years of age with breast cancer who are candidates for sentinel lymph node detection will be included.
* N0 patients or patients who have undergone target axillary detection with good response

Exclusion Criteria:

* Lymphadenectomy
